duties_responsibilities.duty: Define the high-level Logical Architecture (aka System Design) of the product, aligning to architecture principles.
Ideate, analyze, and architect enhancements that will delight our customers.
Deep engagement with the AML Domain to ensure seamless integration adhering to the Domain Driven Design principles.
Close collaboration with Engineering, Service architects, Dev Managers to ensure adherence of Product Architecture Principles.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
